8.11 DUIM-Gadgets Module

sheet-viewport-region

Generic function

Summary

Returns the sheet region of the specified sheet's viewport, if it has one.

Signature

sheet-viewport-region sheet => region

Arguments

sheet
An instance of type <sheet>.

Values

region
An instance of type <region>.

Library

duim-gadgets

Module

duim-gadgets

Description

Returns the sheet region of sheet's viewport, if it has one. If sheet has no viewport, it returns sheet's own region.

See also

sheet-viewport, page 643

<viewport>, page 693

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
